snippet: Warning that her rivals could still unseat her as chancellor, Angela Merkel fired up her backers for the last two weeks of a campaign she is widely expected to win.
lead_paragraph: Warning that her rivals could still unseat her as chancellor, Angela Merkel fired up her backers for the last two weeks of a campaign she is widely expected to win.

headline.main: Popular Merkel, Warning of Threat From Rivals, Rallies Supporters
headline.print_headline: Popular Merkel, Warning of Threat From Rivals, Rallies Supporters
